moves.name: Poison Tail
moves.effect: Critical hits land more easily. Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target poisoned.

moves.name: X Attack
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Attack by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Poison Jab
moves.effect: Has a chance (30%) of leaving the target poisoned.

moves.name: Time to Rock!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Sp. Def by 2 stat ranks. Raises the user’s critical-hit rate by 1 stat rank.

passives.name: Fast-Track 2
passives.description: Has a chance (30%) of raising the user’s Speed by one stat rank after its Pokémon uses a move.
